text: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamantī neva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 111. Should any bhikkhunī set out bedding in a dwelling belonging to the Community — or have it set out — and then on departing neither put it away nor have it put away, or should she go without taking leave, it is to be confessed.
